title: Slick Oil with Royce Kurmelovs (416)
description: Global Warming is caused by burning fossil fuels.  "Slick: Australia's Toxic Relationship With Big Oil " is journalist Royce Kurmelovs' account of our role.  Dr Karl and Royce and explore how the science was silenced Down Under. drkarl.com
